body:
Hey everyone!

How was everyone's day today?
I have been considering for a very long time, whether to purchase a rank in this server, or to not.
So, after a long contemplation, I concluded that I think purchasing a rank would be a TERRIFIC idea!

I wanted to ask you all a question.
Can you purchase a rank in Avicus, using an App Store gift card?
I know that you are supposed to use debit, credit, Visa, or PayPal, but just asking :)
Thank you so much guys!
I hope to see you guys in game tonight!
Bye!

title: A Question about Purchasing Ranks

replies.body: I don't believe so. It should say what you are able to pay with.
replies.body_tagged: I don't believe so. It should say what you are able to pay with.

replies.body: I think you can only pay with PayPal and something else.
replies.body_tagged: I think you can only pay with PayPal and something else.

replies.body:
Oh ok! I see!
Thanks for all of your umm...comments!
See you soon!
